publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1524.1 Bill Aitken: Housing (Scotland) Billâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1524) in the name of Jackie Baillie, insert at end "but, in so doing, calls upon the Scottish Executive to bring forward at Stage 2 amendments to reflect the terms of the Stage 1 Report of the Social Justice Committee with specific reference to the problems caused by anti-social tenants, the powers of hostel management to remove from their hostels timeously those whom they consider to be a danger to the safety and security of staff and other residents, and the effects upon Housing Associations of an extended right to buy."
